page.title: 10THE FRIDAY MARKET
page.content: Every Friday there is a market which is the major highlight of the shopping week.It takes place in the centre of Shirebrook . The market square has recently been improved by a) excluding vehicles except for loading etc. b) being resurfaced with attractive red paving bricks in a herring-bone design. c) having raised flower beds built and grassy areas provided for sitting on. Traders come from as far afield as Leicester, Nottingham and Doncaster to set up their wares on permanently erected metal stalls. Their day starts around 6:30 a.m. and usually they have packed up and gone by 4:30 p.m.
